CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 13, 1960, pg. 28 reads: "Happy Couple - Ernie Banks nad his wife Eloyce, were guests in Pittsburgh over the weekend for the Dapper Dan banquet. Mrs. Banks, who has been doing a lot of traveling with the National League's most valuable player this winter, also will accompany Ernie to spring training this year. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Ernie Banks seated on arm of chair with arms around wife Eloyce Banks, wearing dark suit, light colored fur scarf, and pearl choker, posed in interior
